result.name: corporate-dataset_1
result.notes: A collection of datasets including the following: Register of SLC Board Members declared interests; Register of Gifts and Hospitality offered and provided; the Freedom of Information Register (which covers the subject, requestor details and workflow event dates in responding to the requests) and Board papers, including agenda, minutes and documents for Board meetings
result.title: Corporate Dataset

extras.value: Responses to FOI requests are already published on SLC's FOI disclosure log on a regular basis.  No planned released at present for other datasets, but this can be reviewed.  Information may be released in response to requests for information under FOI.
